name: List statuses for a specific ref

params.name: ref
params.description: Ref to list the statuses from. It can be a SHA, a branch name, or a tag name.

params.name: page
params.description: Page number of the results to fetch.

description:
Users with pull access can view commit statuses for a given ref:

This resource is also available via a legacy route: `GET /repos/:owner/:repo/statuses/:ref`.

Statuses are returned in reverse chronological order. The first status in the list will be the latest one.
